body.p: Ohio, twenty-sixth governor amd state official. Marietta, Ohio, native. Attended Ohio University. Clerk of the Ohio State Senate from 1825 to 1837. Member of the House of Representatives of the State of Ohio from 1838 to 1839. State auditor of Ohio from 1839 to 1845. Secured the Union gubernatorial nomination and was elected governor of Ohio in the 1863 general election. Governor of Ohio from 1863 to 1865.
